reviews.text: Awesome cocktails. Really awesome cocktails. Not cheap but excellent given the quality. The service was fantastic, impeccable. I'd always worried it might be stuffy, instead it was warm, knowledgeable and attentive. Did I mention the cocktails. Did I mention the service.

We dined in the Siren restaurant, it was amazing! Absolutely faultless cooking, fish was perfect, flavours were epic! Service was wonderful, the lovely Irish lady looking after us through dinner was fantastic! Well worth a visit!

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay here. The central location within walking distance of Westminster, Buckingham Palace, Hyde Park and Mayfair is a huge plus. In addition to the refined elegance, I appreciated the quirks like the little stuffed sheep that adorn the place.
One of a kind hotel. My advice is to sit at the bar and watch the bar team make your cocktails. True professionals and exceptional cocktails 🍸

The Goring Hotel is delightful. The staff are excellent, the hotel is in immaculate condition and the rooms are very well attended. High Tea is glorious, with brilliant service in a wonderful setting. Would definitely recommend a visit.
